parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current wind vector (in m/s) as array [x, y, z].<br>
'''NOTE:''' the last value (z, "up-down") always returns 0 – wind being only horizontal.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''wind'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_windArray = '''wind''';</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setWind]], [[windDir]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">
<dt class="note">[[User:Ceeeb|Ceeeb]]</dt>
<dd class="note">In '''OFP 1.96''', wind speed and direction are directly related to [[overcast]].

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
